title: StarCraft.II.Legacy.of.the.Void-RELOADED
description:
nERv

StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void (c) Blizzard

11/2015 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Battle.net
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: RTS

StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void is the final chapter in the epic scifi
storyline spanning the StarCraft II trilogy

Players will guide the powerful Protoss in the epic conclusion to Blizzard's
award-winning RTS series and aim to unite the three races in the ultimate
battle for survival against an ancient evil threatening all life in the
universe

Featuring new units and the introduction of new cooperative and multiplayer
modes, Legacy of the Void is the ultimate strategy experience and StarCraft
at its finest

P.S.: Wings of Liberty and Heart of the Swarm are included, as are offline
multiplayer and arcade maps

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory, and then run the .bat file
5. Play the game using our offline launcher and default login (dlrdr.com
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT

Launcher note

Run the game offline using "StarCraft II Offline.exe". Update your game
shortcut if needed. The following launcher parameters are supported

-keygen (creates a reg entry license for offline play
-genprofile (generates dummy offline profile for "John Doe
-cacheinit (will copy cache to %programdata

" Enjoy the new installer tune by LHS
